body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.7 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Improved system tray support.
Better support for installers with assemblies.
Many of the msvcrt "secure" functions implemented.
A lot of fixes to the GStreamer support.
Many MSXML improvements.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
